verses.name: Ezekiel 41:22
verses.text: The altar of wood was three cubits high, and the length thereof two cubits; and the corners thereof, and the length thereof, and the walls thereof, were of wood: and he said unto me, This is the table that is before the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 41:23
verses.text: And the temple and the sanctuary had two doors.

verses.name: Ezekiel 41:24
verses.text: And the doors had two leaves apiece, two turning leaves; two leaves for the one door, and two leaves for the other door.
